data.chText: 擦；拭；抹；揩；蹭
data.enText: to rub sth against a surface, in order to remove dirt or liquid from it; to rub a surface with a cloth, etc. in order to clean it

data.chText: 请在垫子上蹭一蹭脚。
data.enText: Please wipe your feet on the mat.

data.chText: 他用一块干净的手巾擦了擦双手。
data.enText: He wiped his hands on a clean towel.

data.chText: 她边抽泣边用手巾纸拭擦眼泪。
data.enText: She was sniffing and wiping her eyes with a tissue.

data.chText: 他用一块面包把碟子擦干净。
data.enText: He wiped his plate clean with a piece of bread.

data.chText: （用布、手等）擦干净，抹掉
data.enText: to remove dirt, liquid, etc. from sth by using a cloth, your hand, etc.

data.chText: 他擦去额头上的汗。
data.enText: He wiped the sweat from his forehead.

data.chText: 她把化的妆擦掉了。
data.enText: She wiped off her make-up.

data.chText: 用那块布把脏东西擦掉。
data.enText: Use that cloth to wipe up the mess.

data.chText: 别那么傻笑啦。
data.enText: Wipe that stupid smile off your face.

data.chText: 消除，抹去（计算机、磁带或录像机上的信息等）
data.enText: to remove information, sound, images, etc. from a computer, tape or video

data.chText: 你一定是把我录制的节目给抹掉了。
data.enText: You must have wiped off that programme I recorded.

data.chText: 有人把所有磁带上录制的内容都抹掉了。
data.enText: Somebody had wiped all the tapes.

data.chText: 抹去（旧事）
data.enText: to deliberately forget an experience because it was unpleasant or embarrassing

data.chText: 我设法把这整个经历从心中抹掉。
data.enText: I tried to wipe the whole episode from my mind.

data.chText: 你永远不能把过去一笔勾销。
data.enText: You can never wipe out the past.
wipe sb/sth off the face of the earth
wipe sth off the map

data.chText: 使…从地球上消失；彻底消除
data.enText: to destroy or remove sb/sth completely
wipe the slate clean

data.chText: 把以往过错一笔勾销；一消前愆；捐弃前嫌
data.enText: to agree to forget about past mistakes or arguments and start again with a relationship
wipe/mop the floor with sb

data.chText: （在辩论或竞赛中）彻底打败对手，把对手打得一败涂地
data.enText: to defeat sb completely in an argument or a competition
wipe sth↔down

data.chText: （用湿布）彻底揩擦干净
data.enText: to clean a surface completely, using a wet cloth

data.chText: 她拿了一块布把厨房桌面擦得干干净净。
data.enText: She took a cloth and wiped down the kitchen table.
wipe sth off sth

data.chText: 从…除掉（或抹掉）
data.enText: to remove sth from sth

data.chText: 今天的股票价格下挫造成数十亿英镑的损失。
data.enText: Billions of pounds were wiped off share prices today.
wipe out

data.chText: （尤指做滑雪或冲浪等体育运动时）跌倒，翻跌下来
data.enText: to fall over, especially when you are doing a sport such as skiing or surfing
wipe sb↔out

data.chText: 使疲惫不堪
data.enText: to make sb extremely tired

data.chText: 一路舟车辛劳让她疲惫不堪。
data.enText: All that travelling has wiped her out.
wipe sb/sth↔out

data.chText: 彻底消灭；全部摧毁
data.enText: to destroy or remove sb/sth completely

data.chText: 地震把整座整座的村庄夷为平地。
data.enText: Whole villages were wiped out by the earthquake.

data.chText: 去年的利润几乎全都赔光了。
data.enText: Last year's profits were virtually wiped out.

data.chText: 消灭疟疾的运动
data.enText: a campaign to wipe out malaria

data.chText: 擦；揩；拭
data.enText: an act of cleaning sth using a cloth

data.chText: 你快点把桌子擦一下行吗？
data.enText: Can you give the table a quick wipe?

data.chText: （湿）抹布，纸巾
data.enText: a special piece of thin cloth or soft paper that has been treated with a liquid and that you use to clean away dirt and bacteria

data.chText: 记住带尿布和婴儿的湿纸巾。
data.enText: Remember to take nappies and baby wipes .

means: 消除，抹去(计算机、磁带或录像机上的信息等)

data.enText: wipe sb/sth off the face of the earth
wipe sth off the map

data.enText: All that travelling has wiped her out.

tr: the act of rubbing or wiping
example: he gave the hood a quick rub
He passed his hands over the soft cloth

value.def: If you wipe something, you rub its surface to remove dirt or liquid from it.

example.ex: When he had finished washing he began to wipe the basin clean...
example.tran: 他清洗完后开始把洗脸池擦拭干净。

example.ex: Lainey wiped her hands on the towel.
She gave the table a quick wipe and disappeared behind the counter.
example.tran: 她很快地擦了擦桌子，然后就消失到柜台后面去了。

value.def: If you wipe dirt or liquid from something, you remove it, for example by using a cloth or your hand.

example.ex: Gleb wiped the sweat from his face...
example.tran: 格莱布擦去脸上的汗水。

example.ex: He shook his head and wiped his tears with a tissue.
example.tran: 他摇摇头，用纸巾擦掉眼泪。

value.def: A wipe is a small moist cloth for cleaning things and is designed to be used only once.
If you say that something wipes the smile off someone's face, you mean that it suddenly spoils their enjoyment or removes an advantage that they had and that you are pleased about it.

example.ex: Tony Holmes wiped the smile off the faces of his rivals with a solo 30-second win.
example.tran: 托尼·福尔摩斯以30秒的领先优势获得了这一赛段的个人胜利，使对手再也笑不起来。

value.tran: 让…笑容顿失;使…兴致全无;使…丧失优势
